def rename_images():
    # Path to the folder containing the image files
    folder_path = "images"
    # Get a list of all image files in the folder
    image_files = [f for f in os.listdir(folder_path) if f.endswith(".jpg")]
    # Loop through each image file and rename it
    for i, old_name in enumerate(image_files):
        new_name = f"coindesk_multiple_{i}.jpg"
        old_path = os.path.join(folder_path, old_name)
        new_path = os.path.join(folder_path, new_name)

    # Path to the folder containing the image files
    folder_path = "images"
    # Get a list of all image files in the folder
    image_files = [f for f in os.listdir(folder_path) if f.endswith(".jpg")]

        new_name = f"coindesk_multiple_{i}.jpg"

        new_path = os.path.join(folder_path, new_name)

def get_file_extension(file_name):
    # Split the file name by '.' to separate the base name and extension
    parts = file_name.split('.')
    # Check if there is at least one period in the file name
    if len(parts) > 1:
        # The file extension is the last part of the split
        extension = parts[-1]
        return extension
